text:
@AOC You are a #racist #aoc
All people white, brown, black, yellow or blue are getting sick. 
Rich, middle class or poor getting sick. Money doesn't buy U a way out! This virus doesn't discriminate. It's hitting the older population 65+ so much harder #coronavirusdeaths
